Featuring the voices of: Laurie Anderson and Lou Reed!

The Pie Menu Voice Modulator

Picture a glowing circular interface floating before the performer:

  • Center Hub: A pulsing orb showing the current voice blend - swirls of color representing each character's essence
  • Inner Ring: 8 primary character voices arranged like compass points:
    • North: Nina's punk screech
    • Northeast: Laurie's electronic whisper
    • East: Lou's gravelly drawl
    • Southeast: Divine's theatrical boom
    • South: Rocky's silent vibration
    • Southwest: Rickles' rapid-fire snark
    • West: Minsky's professorial tone
    • Northwest: The Cat's sardonic purr
  • Outer Ring: Emotion modifiers that ripple with color:
    • Rage (red flames)
    • Ecstasy (golden sparkles)
    • Confusion (purple swirls)
    • Enlightenment (white radiance)
    • Sarcasm (green zigzags)
  • Gesture Control:
    • Pull towards a voice to blend it in
    • Circular motions to add vibrato or distortion
    • Pinch to compress, spread to expand frequency range
    • Flick to trigger voice glitches and frame breaks

Visual Description for Image Generation:
"A holographic circular interface floating in space, with a glowing central orb surrounded by two concentric rings. The inner ring has 8 nodes, each containing a different character's portrait rendered in neon colors. The outer ring pulses with emotional energy patterns. Ethereal threads connect the performer's hands to the interface, leaving trails of light as they gesture. The whole system hovers above a stage filled with recursive screens and error-diffused reality warps. Quantum particles dance between the voice nodes."
